amendment.description: Amendment directs the Army Corps of Engineers to grant the Rathbun Regional Water Association the right of first refusal to contract for any increment of the remaining water supply storage allocation in Rathbun Lake.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-100 to provide the Rathbun Regional Water Association with a right of first refusal to purchase water supply storage from the Corps of Engineers at Rathbun Lake, Iowa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
